value:
select 
case when MAX_SID is null then 1 else MAX_SID+1 end as batch_id,
'Daily' as batch_type,
getdate() as start_time,
cast(null as timestamp) as end_time,
'Running' as status,
'Taskflow-tfl_CDM_Daily_CL' as description
from 
(SELECT MAX(batch_id) AS MAX_SID FROM data_clientes_cl.cdm_cl_dwh_batch_t)
